mdRecord.dcterms:title: Topography area surrounding city of Richmond / R.H. Randall & Company, Topographic Engineers, Toledo, Ohio ; Department of Public Works, Allen J. Saville, Director, G.M. Bowers, Chief of Surveys
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Holland, W. C.
R. H. Randall & Company.
Richmond (Va.). Department of Public Works
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 51 x 67 cm., on 48 sheets 61 x 77 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Incomplete set; total number of sheets in set unknown. Library has: sheets 10, 14, 21-23, 27-28, 30-37, 40, 42, 44-49, 53-55, 62-67, 69-70, 98-106, 141-142. Set also includes Sheet 38, Ed. of 1922, Rev. 1929 and Sheets 26 and 52, Ed. of 1923.
Relief shown by contours and spot heights.
W.C. Holland listed as Engineer in Charge on most sheets.
Sheets are numbered, with collective title in upper margin, but are otherwise untitled.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Richmond (Va.)--Maps, Topographic
Richmond Metropolitan Area (Va.)--Maps, Topographic
